sharkord.author: Diogo Martino
sharkord.description: A plugin that allows users to stream IPTV channels directly within Sharkord

scripts.build:dev: bun run build && cp -r dist/* /home/martino/repos/sharkord/apps/server/data/plugins/ && cp ./bin/ffmpeg /home/martino/repos/sharkord/apps/server/data/plugins/sharkord-iptv/bin/ffmpeg && chmod +x /home/martino/repos/sharkord/apps/server/data/plugins/sharkord-iptv/bin/ffmpeg
scripts.build:zip: bun run build && zip -r sharkord-iptv.zip dist/*
